Great choice! The Bernina Express is a fantastic journey, and the views are breathtaking. Here are some tips for planning your trip:

1. Book your tickets in advance: The Bernina Express is a popular train, especially during peak tourist season. Book your tickets in advance to secure your preferred date and time. 2. Choose the right seat: The Bernina Express offers both standard and panoramic seats. The panoramic seats provide unobstructed views of the surrounding mountains, while the standard seats offer more comfort. Choose the seat that best fits your needs. 3. Plan your route: The Bernina Express travels through several towns and stops along the way. Research the towns and attractions along the route to plan your itinerary. 4. Pack for the journey: The journey takes around four hours, so make sure you pack enough food and drinks for the trip. Bring a camera, a pair of binoculars, and warm clothing, as the temperature can drop at higher elevations. 5. Consider a tour: You can book a guided tour of the Bernina Express that includes transportation, tickets, and a guided tour of the surrounding towns and attractions. I hope you have a great trip!
